title: Poot Pitsawat
overview: Poot Pitsawat follows the life of Dao and Marut. Dao is a beautiful ghost under a spell of a monster who uses her to take blood from those men who're attracted to her. Marut jumps in to help Dao break away from this monster and to take her home. While Marut is falling in love with Dao, his mom complicates things further when she arranges a woman for him.
